subject: Important: Air Conditioning Maintenance Tonight
body:
Please be advised that essential maintenance will be performed on the building's air conditioning system after 7:00 PM tonight. Some noise disruption may occur.

We appreciate your patience and apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000

subject: Follow-up: Kuhlman - Cassin performance report
body:
Hi Thomas,

Hope you are well.

I'm following up on the performance report. We require an update by EOD Thursday for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Michael Jones

--
Michael Jones
Portfolio Manager
National Provident Fund
Wellington, New Zealand

subject: Follow-up: Wuckert, Schamberger and Walter request for proposal
body:

Kind regards,

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Club Plus
body:
Thomas,

Client instruction just came down. We need to liquidate the the small-cap portfolio.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888
